name: Erebos
description:
Erebos is a platformer in 2.5D view.

You find yourself in a strange place without memories.
Find what happens to you!

With a wide range of actions, Athena is able to find his way into the levels.
You can switch between forms to change the way you interact with the environment.

-----

A controller is highly recommanded. If not, you need to be in QWERTY and use mouse button to switch forms.

-----

This game is a student project,
made in one month with 3 game designers and 4 game artists.
